member.name: T:Sceelix.Gis.Procedures.GisLoadProcedure
member.summary: Loads features from Esri Shapefiles into point, path or mesh entities.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Gis.Procedures.GisLoadProcedure._output
member.summary: Actors that were loaded. Depending on the file, it could return points, paths, meshes or a combination of all.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Gis.Procedures.GisLoadProcedure._parameterFile
member.summary: Shape file from which to load the Gis data.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Gis.Procedures.GisLoadProcedure._parameterReproject
member.summary: If checked, the data will be reprojected to the indicated coordinate system.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Gis.Procedures.GisLoadProcedure._attributeProjection
member.summary: Attribute where to store the original coordinate projection.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Gis.Procedures.GisLoadProcedure._attributeData
member.summary: Attribute where to store the list/row of data associated to each feature.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Gis.Procedures.OsmLoadProcedure
member.summary: Loads features from OpenStreetMap files into point, path or mesh entities.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Gis.Procedures.OsmLoadProcedure._output
member.summary: Actors that were loaded. Depending on the file, it could return points, paths, meshes or a combination of all.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Gis.Procedures.OsmLoadProcedure._parameterFile
member.summary: The OpenStreetMap file to be loaded. OpenStreeMap files can be downloaded from http://www.openstreetmap.org/ by choosing the "Export" section on the top menu of the site.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Gis.Procedures.OsmLoadProcedure._parameterCenterResults
member.summary: Indicates if the loaded data should be centered on the origin (0,0,0) or not. Easier for data manipulation and to reduce precision errors.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Gis.Procedures.OsmLoadProcedure._attributeTags
member.summary: The attribute where tag information associated to each Openstreetmap feature is stored.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Gis.Procedures.OsmLoadProcedure._attributeMeta
member.summary: The attribute where meta information (id, author, etc.) associated to each Openstreetmap feature is stored.
